title: How do I use my phone as a USB flash drive?
answer: [The following USB connection methods are available: ]() Device file manager (MTP): MTP stands for Media Transfer Protocol. In this mode, you can synchronize media files(pictures, records, and videos etc.) between your phone and a computer that supports MTP. [SD card and storage device can also be recognized.]() USB flash drive mode: If a SD card is inserted into your phone, you can use your phone as a USB flash drive and transfer files between your SD card and computer. SD card can be recognized, but storage device cannot be recognized. Charge only: In this mode, you can use a computer to charge your phone. Note: When your phone is connected to a Mac, you can manage files on your phone using MTP, but the dial-up connection function on the Mac is currently unavailable. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111748)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111749)
